name: Blitz - Win Cash
description:
Play Blitz Games - The gaming competition app where you win real money by playing very fun games such as Solitaire, Bingo, Pool, Helix Jump, Ball Blast, Blackjack, Poker and more blitz games. Why not having fun playing your classic games and win prizes at the same time? Try it out today!

100 000 Downloads - This app has already received more than 100 000 overall downloads!

Blitz simply makes e-sport accessible for everyone.

Win prizes by playing games against opponents at the same level! Users are matched with other same level players, so everyone gets its chance to win! Our games are totally fair and only skill-based.

Play against only real players, no bots are allowed.

The secret to win?
Practice as much as you want, try out our beautiful collection of Blitz Games, Win big prizes!

Don't miss the best app everyone is talking about lately!

UPDATE

You said Pool?! We've just released a new Game: POOL.
Pool is now available in our Blitz Games Collection! Excited to see how much you will like it!


BLITZ FEATURES

- Get unlimited gaming for free, there is no boring ads while playing Solitaire and other games
- Train with practice mode. Blitz lets you play games in practice mode! Get trained before playing real cash games :)
- 1 vs 1 battles on Helix and Ball Blast and other classic games such as Solitaire, Bingo, BlackJack, Pool...
- 32 players tournaments
- Win trophies and get to the top of the leaderboard
- League for Solitaire, Bingo, Skill-based Slots, Blackjack, Pool and all other games
- High score events for solitaire cash
- Brawl for Helix
- Spin & Go for Solitaire, Bingo, Skill-based, Blackjack, Pool and all other games
- Choose among a variety of gameplay
- Get daily rewards and bonus.
- Enjoy daily challenges and win rewards!
- Wheel spins for fun and win prizes / coins!
- Paypal deposits
- VIP program and perks
- And many more!

Blitz - Win Cash is FREE to download and play!


BLITZ GAMES

Blitz provides a sweet collection of free fun games.

- Klondike Solitaire Cash
- Bingo Cash
- Helix Jump
- Ball Blast
- Flappy Dunk
- Rolly Vortex
- Color Road
- Word Search and Race
- Skill-based Slots
- Puzzle
- 21 Blackjack
- Pool
- Fruits Match 3, no jewel here
- Ultimate Poker
and more to come: card games, bubble games ...

No need to be a sport expert, it's better than poker, fantasy leagues and fantasy sports!
We make classic games such as Solitaire, Bingo, Skill-based Slots, Pool accessible for everyone on Blitz with no ads!

CASH GAMES

Please note that Cash competitions are only available in the following US States: District of Columbia, Alabama, Alaska, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming.
If you don't live a region where cash game are enabled you can still play for free.

FEEDBACK & SUPPORT

- If you like Blitz, don't hesitate to rate us on the App Store.
- Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Blitzwincash/
- Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blitzwincash/
- If you have any question, feedback or any suggestion feel free to contact us at supportblitz@vlbapps.com

Thanks for playing Blitz Games!
